text: Scott Eugene DesJarlais ( ; born February 21, 1964) is an American politician and physician. He has been the U.S. representative for since 2011. He is a member of the Republican Party. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Scott DesJarlais official U.S. House website * Scott DesJarlais for Congress * * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Tennessee Category:American physicians Category:Politicians from Des Moines, Iowa Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Scott DesJarlais
